litters.name: pixie-litter-4
updates: Pixie (F1 Goldendoodle) and Judah (miniature poodle) welcomed 9 puppies on Aug 17th.
Puppies will be ready to go home October 12th. They will grow to be around 30-35 lbs as adults.

mother.name: Pixie
biographies: Pixie (55lbs.) is a sweetheart who just wants to be near her owners and play fetch. She is gentle, quiet, and always happy.  She is a devoted mom who's super focused on her puppies.

father.name: Judah
biographies: Judah (15 lbs.) is sweet, intelligent, handsome and just an overall wonderful example of a miniature poodle.

adults.name: Pixie
biographies: Pixie is your typical Goldendoodle who loves attention. She could sit for hours and just be petted.  She loves people and playing fetch.  She will play fetch until she drops and even brings in her balls and sleep with them! She is so sweet and gentle, great with children. Puppies from her litter are happy, confident, bubbly, and playful, just like momma.
She lives in our home with my daughter as her special person and they are inseparable. They sleep together, play and go on adventures.

adults.name: Brody
biographies: Brody is a sweet confident & loving dog who is also very intelligent.  He is happy to sit in your lap and be loved on or give kisses. He also loves to run and play with other dogs.  Structurally very balanced, well proportioned, moving soundly and carries himself well. Available as a stud with live cover or side by side AI (within 1 hour of Allen Texas).  Also our reprodutive vet can ship fresh or frozen semen.
